text: The Skirmish at Ackworth was a battle that was fought between the Union army and the Confederate army in Cobb County, Georgia on June 3, 1864. The result of the Battle is inconclusive. ==References== * https://books.google.com/books?id=OBkNAQAAMAAJ&pg;=PA697&lpg;=PA697&dq;=skirmish+at+ackworth&source;=bl&ots;=6rejkxBubf&sig;=dONPFGaVG8b3x54ND0QpCIbU_kc&hl;=en&sa;=X&ei;=6ymfVbnjDouiyASHuLbIAw&ved;=0CBwQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q;=skirmish%20at%20ackworth Acworth, Georgia Arkworth Ackworth Category:Conflicts in 1864 Category:June 1864 events Category:1864 in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Cobb County, Georgia
title: Skirmish at Ackworth
